sys_script_include.description: Getting the manager of logged in user
sys_script_include.name: GetManager

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_cf20851c1b8b90103311877ddc4bcb91
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_525455_concur.GetManager</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Getting the manager of logged in user</description><name>GetManager</name><script><![CDATA[var GetManager = Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetManager.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{

    // Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
    // Use the sysparm_userID passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the User table.
   
    getManager: function() {
        var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
        userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
        return userRecord.manager + '';
    },
    type: 'GetManager'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-31 09:39:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf20851c1b8b90103311877ddc4bcb91</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetManager</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Concur" source="x_525455_concur">be5b8fe61bb650103311877ddc4bcbe7</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Concur">be5b8fe61bb650103311877ddc4bcbe7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cf20851c1b8b90103311877ddc4bcb91</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-31 09:39:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
